textBox.richText: Latest update (to this entry): 9/19/10 OH MY FG IT WORKED! THE ULCER-INDUCING SETTING UP ON THE A.N. HOSTING SERVER I BOUGHT THE DOMAIN NAME FROM WORKED! Edit: (yeah, I wound up not buying from “””GoDaddy””” because Ricky showed me one of the VlogBros. videos about buying from A.N. Hosting and I was all “k.” Cause apparently they had FTP server capabilities. And I really didn’t want to have to subscribe to MobileMe just to post my site using my own domain). I AM SO EXCITED OMG. …So yeah, now you all have to go to www.MyLifeisDoyle.com to see my site! (Credits go to Andrew Lo for pretty much coming up with that title and I just adored it so much). 9/15/10 Update: I think I’m going to remove the Facebook notification for when I update here. I still want this blog to feel somewhat of a secret/private place, even though I do know people read it. At least it will give the allusion that it’s all private/secret. I use italics too much. Also omfmogmofg I can now publish music here again without any errors which meant nothing but were annoying nonetheless! Expect great things in the future. Update: And now I’m having Fun with Fonts! The main title of the site now looks better than before. I am so Giddy with Glee …and alliteration. 9/19/10 Update (Again!): So it has come to my attention that most computers do not have the font for the title of this here blog! I got by with a little help from my friends and used the advice of taking a picture of the title and then placing that over the font. GENIUS! …Why can I never think of simple things like this.
